message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more since I proposed first.
I think I deserve a bit more since I had to reject your unfair offer
I understand you want a larger share Bob, but my offer is more balanced.  Don't forget the money is worth less every round!
You're right about the inflation, but I still think I can get a better deal. This is my counteroffer.
Bob, let's be reasonable. This is slightly better than your last offer, and inflation is eating our money away!
